title: [2.1.x] Make cluster/report both receive and send metadata
description:
Issue Description

Nacos deployed on k8s env, using headless service hosts in cluster.conf.
When pod-2 readiness not ready, pod-0 and pod-1 cannot report to pod-2 successfully due to unknown host exception.
However, pod-2 can do report successfully.
description_text:
Issue Description
Nacos deployed on k8s env, using headless service hosts in cluster.conf.

However, pod-2 can do report successfully.
